org.microbean.jpa.weld

Class JpaInjectionServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.jpa.weld.JpaInjectionServices
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, JpaInjectionServices

    @Issue(id="WELD-2563",
       uri="https://issues.jboss.org/browse/WELD-2563")
public final class JpaInjectionServices
extends Object
implements JpaInjectionServices
    A JpaInjectionServices implementation that integrates JPA functionality into Weld-based CDI environments.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    JpaInjectionServices

    • Method Detail

      • registerPersistenceContextInjectionPoint

        public final ResourceReferenceFactory<EntityManager> registerPersistenceContextInjectionPoint(InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Returns a ResourceReferenceFactory whose ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource() method will be invoked appropriately by Weld later.

        This method never returns null.

        Specified by:
        registerPersistenceContextInjectionPoint in interface JpaInjectionServices
        Parameters:
        injectionPoint - the InjectionPoint annotated with PersistenceContext; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null ResourceReferenceFactory whose ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource() method will create EntityManager instances
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if injectionPoint is null
        See Also:
        ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource()

      • registerPersistenceUnitInjectionPoint

        public final ResourceReferenceFactory<EntityManagerFactory> registerPersistenceUnitInjectionPoint(InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Returns a ResourceReferenceFactory whose ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource() method will be invoked appropriately by Weld later.

        This method never returns null.

        Specified by:
        registerPersistenceUnitInjectionPoint in interface JpaInjectionServices
        Parameters:
        injectionPoint - the InjectionPoint annotated with PersistenceUnit; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null ResourceReferenceFactory whose ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource() method will create EntityManagerFactory instances
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if injectionPoint is null
        See Also:
        ResourceReferenceFactory.createResource()

      • resolvePersistenceContext

        @Deprecated
public final EntityManager resolvePersistenceContext(InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Deprecated. See the documentation for the JpaInjectionServices.resolvePersistenceContext(InjectionPoint) method.
        Calls the registerPersistenceContextInjectionPoint(InjectionPoint) method and invokes ResourceReference.getInstance() on its return value and returns the result.

        This method never returns null.

        Specified by:
        resolvePersistenceContext in interface JpaInjectionServices
        Parameters:
        injectionPoint - an InjectionPoint annotated with PersistenceContext; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null EntityManager
        See Also:
        registerPersistenceContextInjectionPoint(InjectionPoint)

      • resolvePersistenceUnit

        @Deprecated
public final EntityManagerFactory resolvePersistenceUnit(InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Deprecated. See the documentation for the JpaInjectionServices.resolvePersistenceUnit(InjectionPoint) method.
        Calls the registerPersistenceUnitInjectionPoint(InjectionPoint) method and invokes ResourceReference.getInstance() on its return value and returns the result.

        This method never returns null.

        Specified by:
        resolvePersistenceUnit in interface JpaInjectionServices
        Parameters:
        injectionPoint - an InjectionPoint annotated with PersistenceUnit; must not be null
        Returns:
        a non-null EntityManagerFactory
        See Also:
